mdRecord.dcterms:title: La media noche / (José Aviles) ; arranged by W.T. Francis
Avilés, José, (Composer). Media noche; arr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Avilés, José (Composer)
Francis, W. T. (William T.)
Mexican Military Band
Payen, Encarnacion
Wehrmann, Henri Mme, 1830-1911
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally for band; arranged for piano.
"Played at the World's Exposition at New Orleans by the celebrated Mexican Military Band"--Series title page.
Title page illustration: Flags of Mexico and the United States.
At head of caption: "To Señor Encarnacion Payen, leader of the Mexican Band."
Advertisement on p. [8]: "The first and largest publisher of Mexican music in the United States, Junius Hart," with list of publications.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Mexico / arranged for piano by W.T. Francis ; 2

Piano music, Arranged
Popular instrumental music--To 1901
